professional_summary: Highly motivated professional with refined sales, marketing, and managerial skills focused on growing revenue and profits. Consistently ranked in top 5% of sales performers, with extensive experience in B2B information technology and print advertising services in Cincinnati and Columbus metropolitan areas. Expert in working with diverse clientele from multinational corporations to smaller organizations.

work_experience.description: Selling IT converged infrastructure consulting services, hardware and software solutions in Greater Cincinnati area
responsibilities: Ranked #1 in account growth and new sales
Responsible for over $1 million in revenue
Added billing consultants representing 25% of company revenue
Managed accounts including Intelligrated, KAO, Great Oaks, Schulman

work_experience.description: Managed IT services sales in Cincinnati, Dayton and N. Kentucky market
responsibilities: Managed major accounts including Luxottica, Great American, Toyota
Responsible for new and ongoing marketing initiatives

work_experience.description: Introduced SupplyLink-Leads program to Building Product Manufacturers and National Building Distributors
